meanings.definition: A treeless plain in the Arctic regions where subsoil is permanently frozen.
meanings.sent1: Polar bears roam the tundras in search of food.
meanings.sent2: The caribou migrate across the vast tundras every year.
meanings.sent3: The penguins decided to have a dance party in the tundras.
meanings.sent4: The silence of the tundras whispers tales of ancient times.
meanings.sent5: The endless white of the tundras stretches to the horizon.

meanings.definition: The flat, treeless Arctic regions of Europe, Asia, and North America.
meanings.sent1: The tundras of Alaska are known for their unique wildlife.
meanings.sent2: Many species of birds nest in the tundras during the summer.
meanings.sent3: The reindeer threw a surprise birthday party in the tundras.
meanings.sent4: The tundras hold secrets of the past beneath their icy surface.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the tundras is both harsh and captivating.
